Sentencas: Magnesium doped lanthanum silicate with apatite-type structure, as a solid electrolyte for IT-SOFC (intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells), was prepared by solid state sintering.
Titulo: Preparation of dense silicate electrolyte coating with low pressure plasma spraying and very low pressure plasma spraying for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrolyte coatings were fabricated by LPPS (Low Pressure Plasma Spraying) and VLPPS (Very Low Pressure Plasma Spraying).
Titulo: Preparation of dense silicate electrolyte coating with low pressure plasma spraying and very low pressure plasma spraying for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Their microstructures and phase composition were characterized by SEM and XRD.
Titulo: Preparation of dense silicate electrolyte coating with low pressure plasma spraying and very low pressure plasma spraying for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The gas permeability of coatings was measured with pure H-2 and O-2 at room temperature.
Titulo: Preparation of dense silicate electrolyte coating with low pressure plasma spraying and very low pressure plasma spraying for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is shown that dense lanthanum silicate coatings can be obtained by LPPS and VLPPS.
Titulo: Preparation of dense silicate electrolyte coating with low pressure plasma spraying and very low pressure plasma spraying for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Amorphous and trace phases existed in coating deposited by LPPS.
Titulo: Preparation of dense silicate electrolyte coating with low pressure plasma spraying and very low pressure plasma spraying for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Well-crystallized lanthanum silicate coating can be prepared by one step VLPPS.
Titulo: Preparation of dense silicate electrolyte coating with low pressure plasma spraying and very low pressure plasma spraying for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The specific permeability of coating fabricated by VLPPS is 1.79 x 10(-19) m(2).
Titulo: Preparation of dense silicate electrolyte coating with low pressure plasma spraying and very low pressure plasma spraying for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
Preparation of dense silicate electrolyte coating with low pressure plasma spraying and very low pressure plasma spraying for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
Preparation of dense silicate electrolyte coating with low pressure plasma spraying and very low pressure plasma spraying for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
